sentences.sentence: And, to top it all, he often doubted whether, his mind being evolved, he could even trust it in such matters. All in all, he was too complex, too subtle a man to be left to the polemicists.
sentences.translation: 总体来说，他经常怀疑他自己的思想是不是在进化，他几乎不能相信这样的事实，总之，他是如此的复杂的难以琢磨的一个人以至于针对他的各种争论不会消失。
